author: lgo
msg: Add a mechanism to choose one of multiple authentication protocols based on
the authentication header as sent by the http server. Add an interface(vtable)
so new authentication protocols can easily be plugged in later. Note that the
interface currently only provides an initialization and a handling function,
which is sufficient for Basic authentication, but it might not be enough for
(serf_auth_protocols): new global variable, defines the list of supported
(init_basic_connection): new function, initializes the Basic authn protocol
(handle_auth): load the protocol from serf_auth_protocols based on the
(struct svn_ra_serf__session_t): new auth_protocol field, stores the current
authentication protocol for this session, if any.
svn_serf__init_conn_func_t): new function declarations, to be implemented
(serf_auth_protocol_t): an object of this type is to be defined for each
(finish_report): not all authentication protocols allow reuse of authn
headers on a new connection, so move this to an authn protocol specific

author: sage
msg: Typo fixes and stylistic cleanups to the WC diff method.

author: lgo
msg: Move the code for Basic authentication in its own function.
(handle_auth): remove the code for Basic authentication as first step in
making this function a dispatcher for different authentication handlers.
Removed an unneeded loop over authentication header tokens.

author: lgo
msg: Move auth function(s) out of util.c.
